name: Yoga Classes
description: Daily yoga classes led by experienced instructors. Suitable for all levels, from beginners to advanced practitioners.

name: Meditation Workshops
description: Learn meditation techniques to calm your mind and reduce stress. Guided workshops for beginners and advanced meditators.

name: Fitness Bootcamp
description: Intensive fitness bootcamp sessions designed to help you get in shape and boost your energy levels.

name: Nutrition Consultation
description: Personalized nutrition consultations to help you achieve your health and fitness goals.

name: Nature Hikes
description: Explore the beautiful natural surroundings with guided nature hikes. Discover the local flora and fauna.

name: Spa and Relaxation
description: Indulge in spa treatments and relaxation sessions to unwind and rejuvenate during your retreat.
